MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.58pm. Our engineers have arrived in Newton road and confirmed an underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20PM on Wednesday 27 January 2021.
